cards.title: Cooling off in Ahmedabad / The best photographs of the week
cards.rawTitle: The best photographs of the week

item.title: The 20 photographs of the week
item.trailText: The ongoing Rohingya migrant crisis, gorillas, volcanoes, Jane Fonda and 156 outlaw bikers – the best photography in news, culture and sport from around the world this week
item.standFirst: The ongoing Rohingya migrant crisis, gorillas, volcanoes, Jane Fonda and 156 outlaw bikers – the best photography in news, culture and sport from around the world this week

displayImages.caption: A helicopter flies over lava flowing from the Piton de la Fournaise volcano on the French island of La Reunion in the Indian Ocean Photograph: Richard Bouhet/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: A helicopter flies over lava flowing from the Piton de la Fournaise volcano on the French island of La Reunion in the Indian Ocean
displayImages.cleanCaption: A helicopter flies over lava flowing from the Piton de la Fournaise volcano on the French island of La Reunion in the Indian Ocean

displayImages.caption: In the southern city of Ashdod in Israel, ultra-orthodox Jews protest against a shopping centre that opens on Saturdays Photograph: Amir Cohen/Reuters
displayImages.altText: In the southern city of Ashdod in Israel, ultra-orthodox Jews protest against a shopping centre that opens on Saturdays
displayImages.cleanCaption: In the southern city of Ashdod in Israel, ultra-orthodox Jews protest against a shopping centre that opens on Saturdays

displayImages.caption: Teenagers dressed in bridal white surrounded by flowers take part in the Hundred Maidens pilgrimage, in Sorzano, northern Spain, in honour of spring, the fertility of women and the Virgin Mary Photograph: Alvaro Barrientos/AP
displayImages.altText: Teenagers dressed in bridal white surrounded by flowers take part in the Hundred Maidens pilgimage, in Sorzano, northern Spain, in honour of spring, the fertility of women and the Virgin Mary
displayImages.cleanCaption: Teenagers dressed in bridal white surrounded by flowers take part in the Hundred Maidens pilgrimage, in Sorzano, northern Spain, in honour of spring, the fertility of women and the Virgin Mary

displayImages.caption: Refugees from the violence in Burundi rest with their belongings on the shores of Lake Tanganyika in western Tanzania, while waiting for a boat to transport them to Kigoma township Photograph: Thomas Mukoya/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Refugees from the violence in Burundi rest with their belongings on the shores of Lake Tanganyika in western Tanzania, while waiting for a boat to transport them to Kigoma township
displayImages.cleanCaption: Refugees from the violence in Burundi rest with their belongings on the shores of Lake Tanganyika in western Tanzania, while waiting for a boat to transport them to Kigoma township

displayImages.caption: A pipeline that runs along the scenic coastline of Refugio State Beach near Goleta, California, ruptured, spilling about 21,000 gallons of oil into the ocean and on to nearby beaches before it could be repaired. Here buckets of oil have been extracted from the slick by volunteers Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A pipeline that runs along the scenic coastline of Refugio State Beach near Goleta, California, ruptured, spilling about 21,000 gallons of oil into the ocean and on to nearby beaches before it could be repaired. Here buckets of oil have been extracted from the slick by volunteers
displayImages.cleanCaption: A pipeline that runs along the scenic coastline of Refugio State Beach near Goleta, California, ruptured, spilling about 21,000 gallons of oil into the ocean and on to nearby beaches before it could be repaired. Here buckets of oil have been extracted from the slick by volunteers

displayImages.caption: On a hot day on the outskirts of Ahmedabad in India, a girl cools off under water leaking from a broken pipe Photograph: Amit Dave/Reuters
displayImages.altText: On a hot day on the outskirts of Ahmedabad in India, a girl cools off under water leaking from a broken pipe
displayImages.cleanCaption: On a hot day on the outskirts of Ahmedabad in India, a girl cools off under water leaking from a broken pipe

displayImages.caption: McLennan County Sheriff’s Department booking photographs showing men and women arrested and charged with crimes stemming from a mass shootout and fight between biker gangs outside the Twin Peaks bar and restaurant at the Central Texas Marketplace in Waco, Texas, US Photograph: McLennan County Sheriff/EPA
displayImages.altText: McLennan County Sheriff’s Department booking photographs showing men and women arrested and charged with crimes stemming from a mass shootout and fight between biker gangs outside the Twin Peaks bar and restaurant at the Central Texas Marketplace in Waco, Texas, US
displayImages.cleanCaption: McLennan County Sheriff’s Department booking photographs showing men and women arrested and charged with crimes stemming from a mass shootout and fight between biker gangs outside the Twin Peaks bar and restaurant at the Central Texas Marketplace in Waco, Texas, US

displayImages.caption: Members of the Gold Star Mothers Club pray during a candlelight vigil in advance of Memorial Day at the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Washington. Memorial Day falls on the last Monday in May and honours all those who have died serving in the United States military Photograph: Jose Luis Magana/AP
displayImages.altText: Members of the Gold Star Mothers Club pray during a Memorial Day candlelight vigil at the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Washington
displayImages.cleanCaption: Members of the Gold Star Mothers Club pray during a candlelight vigil in advance of Memorial Day at the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Washington. Memorial Day falls on the last Monday in May and honours all those who have died serving in the United States military

displayImages.caption: A farmer gathers wheat in a field in Bhaktapur, Nepal. Thousands of tons of stored crops were destroyed as a result of the recent earthquakes and farmers have not, until now, been able to harvest their crops Photograph: Narendra Shrestha/EPA
displayImages.altText: A farmer gathers wheat in a field in Bhaktapur, Nepal. Thousands of tons of stored crops were destroyed as a result of the recent earthquakes and farmers have not, until now, been able to harvest their crops
displayImages.cleanCaption: A farmer gathers wheat in a field in Bhaktapur, Nepal. Thousands of tons of stored crops were destroyed as a result of the recent earthquakes and farmers have not, until now, been able to harvest their crops

displayImages.caption: A rebel fighter takes up position behind sandbags in al-Ezaa neighbourhood of Aleppo, Syria Photograph: Hosam Katan/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A rebel fighter takes up position behind sandbags in al-Ezaa neighbourhood of Aleppo, Syria
displayImages.cleanCaption: A rebel fighter takes up position behind sandbags in al-Ezaa neighbourhood of Aleppo, Syria

displayImages.caption: Yeomen of the Guard march during a garden party held at Buckingham Palace in London Photograph: Ben Stansall/PA
displayImages.altText: Yeomen of the Guard march during a garden party held at Buckingham Palace inl London
displayImages.cleanCaption: Yeomen of the Guard march during a garden party held at Buckingham Palace in London

displayImages.caption: An ethnic Rohingya Muslim woman looks back as she rides a tuk-tuk near a camp set up outside the city of Sittwe in Burma’s Rakhine state Photograph: Ye Aung Thu/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: An ethnic Rohingya Muslim woman looking back as she rides a tuk-tuk near a camp set up outside the city of Sittwe in Burma’s Rakhine state
displayImages.cleanCaption: An ethnic Rohingya Muslim woman looks back as she rides a tuk-tuk near a camp set up outside the city of Sittwe in Burma’s Rakhine state

displayImages.caption: A Rohingya boy, who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, plays with a ball in a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province Photograph: Beawiharta/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A Rohingya boy, who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, holds his ball as he walks at a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province
displayImages.cleanCaption: A Rohingya boy, who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, plays with a ball in a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province

displayImages.caption: A Bangladeshi migrant who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, inside a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province Photograph: Beawiharta/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A Bangladeshi migrant who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, inside a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province
displayImages.cleanCaption: A Bangladeshi migrant who recently arrived in Indonesia by boat, inside a shelter in Kuala Langsa, in Indonesia’s Aceh province

displayImages.caption: Artem Silchenko of Russia diving from the 27.5-metre platform on the Saint Nicolas Tower during the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series in La Rochelle, France Photograph: Vincent Cututchet/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Artem Silchenko of Russia diving from the 27.5-metre platform on the Saint Nicolas Tower during the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series at La Rochelle, France
displayImages.cleanCaption: Artem Silchenko of Russia diving from the 27.5-metre platform on the Saint Nicolas Tower during the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series in La Rochelle, France

displayImages.caption: Students practise in the gymnastics hall at a sports school in Jiaxing, Zhejiang province, China Photograph: William Hong/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Students practise in the gymnastics hall at a sports school in Jiaxing, Zhejiang province, China
displayImages.cleanCaption: Students practise in the gymnastics hall at a sports school in Jiaxing, Zhejiang province, China

displayImages.caption: American actor Jane Fonda arrives for the screening of Youth during the 68th annual Cannes film festival in France Photograph: Sebastien Nogier/EPA
displayImages.altText: American actor Jane Fonda arrives for the screening of Youth during the 68th annual Cannes film festival, in Cannes, France
displayImages.cleanCaption: American actor Jane Fonda arrives for the screening of Youth during the 68th annual Cannes film festival in France

displayImages.caption: Palestinians at the sea port in Gaza City Photograph: Mohammed Abed/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Palestinians at the sea port in Gaza City
displayImages.cleanCaption: Palestinians at the sea port in Gaza City

displayImages.caption: The Great Wall after rainfall in Chende in north China’s Hebei province Photograph: Guo Zhongxing/Xinhua Press/Corbis
displayImages.altText: The Great Wall after rainfall in Chende in north China’s Hebei province
displayImages.cleanCaption: The Great Wall after rainfall in Chende in north China’s Hebei province

displayImages.caption: A western lowland gorilla baby named Mjukuu, born in October last year, rides on the back of his mother Mbeli at Taronga zoo in Sydney, Australia Photograph: David Gray/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A western lowland gorilla baby named Mjukuu, born in October last year, rides on the back of its mother Mbeli at Taronga zoo in Sydney, Australia
displayImages.cleanCaption: A western lowland gorilla baby named Mjukuu, born in October last year, rides on the back of his mother Mbeli at Taronga zoo in Sydney, Australia
